channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Guardium
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Guardium

item.title: CVE-2017-1757|2024-09-17T03:59:56.827Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.0 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 135858.

item.title: CVE-2020-4678|2024-09-17T01:35:32.159Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.2 could allow an attacker with admin access to obtain and read files that they normally would not have access to. IBM X-Force ID: 186423.

item.title: CVE-2018-1817|2024-09-17T01:46:03.556Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10 and 10.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 150021.

item.title: CVE-2020-4689|2024-09-17T01:36:58.083Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.2 is vulnerable to CVS Injection. A remote privileged attacker could execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of csv file contents. IBM X-ForceID: 186696.

item.title: CVE-2020-4184|2024-09-17T01:21:36.145Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.2 performs an operation at a privilege level that is higher than the minimum level required, which creates new weaknesses or amplifies the consequences of other weaknesses. IBM X-Force ID: 174802..

item.title: CVE-2018-1509|2024-09-17T03:38:03.285Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium EcoSystem 10.5 does not validate, or incorrectly validates, a certificate.This weakness might allow an attacker to spoof a trusted entity by using a man-in-the-middle (MITM) attack. The software might connect to a malicious host while believing it is a trusted host, or the software might be deceived into accepting spoofed data that appears to originate from a trusted host. IBM X-Force ID: 141417.

item.title: CVE-2020-4189|2024-09-17T03:33:46.017Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.2 discloses sensitive information in the response headers that could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 174850.

item.title: CVE-2017-1264|2024-09-17T04:09:27.678Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.0 does not prove or insufficiently proves that the actors identity is correct which can lead to exposure of resources or functionality to unintended actors. IBM X-Force ID: 124739.

item.title: CVE-2020-4193|2024-09-17T01:30:33.391Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.1 uses an inadequate account lockout setting that could allow a remote attacker to brute force account credentials. IBM X-Force ID: 174857.

item.title: CVE-2017-1266|2024-09-17T03:53:05.282Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.0 specifies permissions for a security-critical resource in a way that allows that resource to be read or modified by unintended actors. IBM X-Force ID: 124741.

item.title: CVE-2018-1368|2024-09-17T04:00:02.889Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Database Activity Monitor 9.0, 9.1, and 9.5 could allow a local user with low privileges to view report pages and perform some actions that only an admin should be performing, so there is risk that someone not authorized can change things that they are not suppose to. IBM X-Force ID: 137765.

item.title: CVE-2017-1269|2024-09-17T00:35:59.746Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.0 and 10.1 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-force ID: 124744

item.title: CVE-2017-1255|2024-09-17T00:26:23.094Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.0, 10.0.1, and 10.1 through 10.1.4 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 124675.

item.title: CVE-2020-4990|2024-09-17T03:48:09.644Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.2 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 192710.

item.title: CVE-2021-20427|2024-09-17T04:04:48.096Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.2 uses an inadequate account lockout setting that could allow a remote attacker to brute force account credentials. IBM X-Force ID: 196314.

item.title: CVE-2020-4186|2024-09-17T03:28:05.342Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.5, 10.6, and 11.1 could disclose sensitive information on the login page that could aid in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 174804.

item.title: CVE-2017-1253|2024-09-17T04:00:27.143Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.0 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 124633.

item.title: CVE-2016-0238|2024-09-17T02:16:37.740Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 9.0, 9.1, 9.5, 10.0, and 10.1 transmits sensitive data in cleartext in the query of the request. This could allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information using man in the middle techniques. IBM X-Force ID: 110409

item.title: CVE-2021-20433|2024-09-17T04:14:31.342Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3 could allow a an authenticated user to obtain sensitive information that could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 196345.

item.title: CVE-2021-39076|2024-09-17T02:47:49.740Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.5 and 11.3 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 215585.

item.title: CVE-2021-29773|2024-09-17T02:42:53.724Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.6 and 11.3 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to obtain sensitive information or modify user details caused by an insecure direct object vulnerability (IDOR). IBM X-Force ID: 202865.

item.title: CVE-2020-4921|2024-09-17T04:14:39.016Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.6 and 11.2 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 191398.

item.title: CVE-2017-1271|2024-09-17T03:59:59.192Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 9.0, 9.1, and 9.5 supports interaction between multiple actors and allows those actors to negotiate which algorithm should be used as a protection mechanism such as encryption or authentication, but it does not select the strongest algorithm that is available to both parties. IBM X-Force ID: 124746.

item.title: CVE-2018-1891|2024-09-17T02:36:45.846Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10 and 10.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 152082.

item.title: CVE-2017-1256|2024-09-17T04:05:13.852Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.0, 10.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 124678

item.title: CVE-2020-4681|2024-09-17T01:51:29.280Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 186427.

item.title: CVE-2021-20420|2024-09-17T03:38:18.662Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.2 could disclose sensitive information due to reliance on untrusted inputs that could aid in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 196281.

item.title: CVE-2020-4188|2024-09-17T03:33:39.766Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.6 and 11.1 may use insufficiently random numbers or values in a security context that depends on unpredictable numbers. IBM X-Force ID: 174807.

item.title: CVE-2023-47717|2024-06-04T17:26:34.287Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 12.0 could allow a privileged user to perform unauthorized actions that could lead to a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 271690.

item.title: CVE-2023-47710|2024-06-04T17:26:36.057Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 271525.

item.title: CVE-2023-47711|2024-05-11T13:18:21.646Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow an authenticated user to upload files that would cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 271526.

item.title: CVE-2023-47712|2024-06-04T17:26:41.436Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow a local user to gain elevated privileges on the system due to improper permissions control. IBM X-Force ID: 271527.

item.title: CVE-2023-47709|2024-06-04T17:26:43.588Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system by sending a specially crafted request. IBM X-Force ID: 271524.

item.title: CVE-2023-47711|2024-07-23T21:00:38.139Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow an authenticated user to upload files that would cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 271526.

item.title: CVE-2023-47711|2024-08-02T21:16:43.656Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow an authenticated user to upload files that would cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 271526.

item.title: CVE-2023-47709|2024-08-02T21:16:43.642Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system by sending a specially crafted request. IBM X-Force ID: 271524.

item.title: CVE-2023-47717|2024-08-02T21:16:43.549Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 12.0 could allow a privileged user to perform unauthorized actions that could lead to a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 271690.

item.title: CVE-2023-47710|2024-08-02T21:16:43.555Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 271525.

item.title: CVE-2023-47712|2024-08-02T21:16:43.649Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow a local user to gain elevated privileges on the system due to improper permissions control. IBM X-Force ID: 271527.
